general_advisory: Farmers are advised not to burn the residue of Kharif crops in the fields. Keep harvested matured paddy crops in a safe place. Drain out excess water from crop and vegetable fields. Clean the animal shed by spraying disinfectant/bleaching powder/phenyl.

advisory: Rice grains must be dried under the sun for 3-4 days to 14% moisture for consumption and 12% moisture for seed purpose.
Transfer the already harvested paddy from field to a go down or any shaded place.
Make the threshing floor and storage godown clean and spray Lambda Cyahalothrin 4.9CS@ 1.5ml/litre of water to minimize the chance of future infestation of storage pests.

Brinjal - Drain the excess water from the field to prevent wilting. Apply Neem or Karanja cake @1quintal/acre, Drenching of Tebuconazole @1ml/litre can be recommended.
Cole crops - Uproot the disease-infected plants & expose the soil to the sun.

Papaya - Install Yellow Sticky trap to trap the vector (Whitefly) of Papaya Leaf Curl Virus. Alternate spraying of Neem oil formulation 1500ppm @3ml/litre of water and spray flonicamid 50WG @0.3g/litre to control whitefly.
